fields.desc:
The Monterey Bay Programming Team (MBPT) is created by Miorel Palii, the Fall 2017 Facebook Engineer in Residence at CSU Monterey Bay. It is officially recognized as a student organization in May 2018.

According to the club constitution, MBPT is to:

- Bring together people who are interested in solving coding puzzles, people who are motivated to become a stronger coder, and people who enjoyed coding in a competitive environment, across all majors and backgrounds.

- Engage and motivate its members to come up with ideas and solutions to different types of problems and explore classic data structures and algorithms.

- Prepare its members for upper-division computer science classes, technical job interviews, and programming contests such as ACM-ICPC.
